data.title: Krista Allen Height
data.meta_description: Krista Allen height is 5ft 6  or 167.6 cm tall. Discover more Celebrity Heights and Vote on how tall you think any Celebrity is!
data.text:
Johan said on 18/Sep/17

184.3cm (Night) said on 11/Jun/15

Emmanuelle?? :D

[Editor Rob: in space?]

-------------------

Ah so you have watched it Rob, what a great show that was.

Editor Rob

only to see if bodies lengthen in Space!

even said on 20/Jul/17

five and a half feet tall and around one hundred pounds .

Sammy Derrick said on 29/May/17

I just watched Smallville season 2 episode 2:One thing I'll say is that..SHE'S HOT!!!

And her character in that episode of Smallville,her character is listed as

Atkins Desiree

SEX:Female

HAIR:Brown

HEIGHT:5'1

RACE:White

EYES:Hazel

WEIGHT:102lbs

5'1 REALLY???Guys who are 6'0 look small next to Tom Welling,I think 5'6 RANGE!!!

184.3cm (Night) said on 11/Jun/15

Emmanuelle?? :D

Editor Rob

in space?

Amaze said on 3/Apr/15

lol just saw her on Hawaii-five o on tv and I must say .... HOTT XD

atleast im like 2 inches taller than her xD she looked like she had a good height

Arch Stanton said on 1/Sep/14

Rob you might want to add and TV series such as Baywatch Hawaii and Days of Our Lives, I know her best from those actually. She's scarily hot, quite frightening really, I'm sure a lot of men are intimidated by her!!

Rich Hall said on 5/Jan/14

The lady is stunning! and she can rap Click Here

John said on 3/Jul/11

She was in an episode of Smallville called Heat. She looked very short with Tom Welling even in heels.

jtm said on 15/Jan/11

i actually agree with shaun on this one. i have never seen someone who is 5'7 look as short as she does.rob is there a reason you have her at this height?

Editor Rob

I haven't seen her in anything, but having looked just now she appears shorter.

Vanessa said on 17/May/09

No way. Saw her in person, I'm almost 5'7" and she was a couple inches shorter. About 5'5"
